title: Articles, whereupon it was agreed by the archbishoppes and bishoppes of both prouinces, and the whole cleargie, in the Conuocation holden at London in the yere of our Lorde God. 1562. according to the computation of the Churche of Englande for the auoiding of the diuersities of opinions, and for the stablishyng of consent touching true religion. Put foorth by the Queenes aucthoritie.
author: Church of England.
publicationStmtPublisher: in Powles Churchyard, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
